00159     // Order of dimension elements: Time, Mass, Length, Angle
00160     // Value of dimension elements: exponent of that unit type
00161 
00168     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0> dimensionless;
00169 
00171     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,1,0,0,0,0,0,0,0> time;
00172

00175

00178

00182 
00185 
00187     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,0,0,2,0,0,0,0,0> area;
00188 
00190     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,0,0,3,0,0,0,0,0> volume;
00191 
00193     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,0,1,-3,0,0,0,0,0> density;
00194 
00196     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,-1,0,1,0,0,0,0,0> speed;
00197 
00199     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,-2,0,1,0,0,0,0,0> accel;
00200 
00202     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,-1,0,0,1,0,0,0,0> ang_speed;
00203 
00205     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,-2,0,0,1,0,0,0,0> ang_accel;
00206 
00208     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,-2,1,1,0,0,0,0,0> force;

00211     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,-2,0,1,0,0,0,0,0> stiffness;
00212

00215

00218

00245     template <class Dimensions, class Precision = DefaultPrecision>
00246     struct Quantity
00247     {
00249         explicit Quantity(Precision x) : _value(x) {}
00250 
00252         Quantity() : _value() {}
00253 
00254         template<class OtherPrecision>
00255         Quantity<Dimensions, Precision> & operator=(Quantity<Dimensions, OtherPrecision> const& other) {
00256             return (*this)._value = other.value;
00257         }
00258 
00266         template <class OtherDimensions>
00267         Quantity(Quantity<OtherDimensions, Precision> const& rhs)
00268                 : _value(rhs.value()) {
00269             BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT((
00270                 mpl::equal<Dimensions,OtherDimensions>::type::value
00271             ));
00272         }
00273 
00275         Precision & value() { return _value; }
00276 
00277         const Precision & value() const { return _value; }
00278 
00281         bool operator<(const Quantity<Dimensions, Precision> & r) const {
00282             return _value < r._value;
00283         }
00284 
00285         bool operator<=(const Quantity<Dimensions, Precision> & r) const {
00286             return _value <= r._value;
00287         }
00288 
00289         bool operator>(const Quantity<Dimensions, Precision> & r) const {
00290             return _value > r._value;
00291         }
00292 
00293         bool operator>=(const Quantity<Dimensions, Precision> & r) const {
00294             return _value >= r._value;
00295         }
00296 
00297         bool operator==(const Quantity<Dimensions, Precision> & r) const {
00298             return _value == r._value;
00299         }
00301 
00307         Quantity<Dimensions, Precision> operator+=(const Quantity<Dimensions, Precision> & r) {
00308             return Quantity<Dimensions, Precision>(_value += r._value);
00309         }
00310 
00316         Quantity<Dimensions, Precision> operator-=(const Quantity<Dimensions, Precision> & r) {
00317             return Quantity<Dimensions, Precision>(_value -= r._value);
00318         }
00319 
00320     private:
00321         Precision _value;
00322     };
00323

00328     namespace Internal {
00329         using namespace mpl::placeholders;
00332 
00333         template <class D1, class D2>
00334         struct multiply_dimensions
00335         : mpl::transform<D1,D2,mpl::plus<_1,_2> >
00336         {};
00337 
00338         template <class D1, class D2>
00339         struct divide_dimensions
00340         : mpl::transform<D1,D2,mpl::minus<_1,_2> >
00341         {};
00342 
00344         template <class D>
00345         struct sqrt_dimensions
00346         : mpl::transform<D,mpl::int_<2>,mpl::divides<_1,_2> >
00347         {};
00348 
00349 
00350 
00351         template <class D>
00352         struct sqrt_dims : mpl::divides<D, mpl::int_<2>::type > {};
00353 
00354         /*
00355         double _sqrt(double const& val) {
00356             return std::sqrt(val);
00357         }
00358         */
00359 
00361     } // end of Internal namespace

00376     template<class D, class T>
00377     Quantity<D, T> operator+(const Quantity<D, T> & l, const Quantity<D, T> & r) {
00378         return Quantity<D,T>(l.value() + r.value());
00379     }
00380 
00386     template<class D, class T>
00387     Quantity<D, T> operator-(const Quantity<D, T> & l, const Quantity<D, T> & r) {
00388         return Quantity<D,T>(l.value() - r.value());
00389     }
00390 
00395     template <class D1, class D2, class T>
00396     Quantity<typename Internal::multiply_dimensions<D1,D2>::type, T>
00397     operator*(Quantity<D1, T> l, Quantity<D2, T> r) {
00398         return Quantity<typename Internal::multiply_dimensions<D1,D2>::type, T>(
00399             l.value() * r.value());
00400     }
00401     /*
00402 
00403     template <class D1, class D2, class T1, class T2>
00404     Quantity<typename Internal::multiply_dimensions<D1,D2>::type, T1>
00405     operator*(Quantity<D1, T1> l, Quantity<D2, T2> r) {
00406         return Quantity<typename Internal::multiply_dimensions<D1,D2>::type, T1>(
00407             l.value() * r.value());
00408     }
00409     */
00410 
00414     template <class D1, class D2, class T>
00415     Quantity<typename Internal::divide_dimensions<D1,D2>::type, T>
00416     operator/(Quantity<D1, T> l, Quantity<D2, T> r) {
00417         return Quantity<typename Internal::divide_dimensions<D1,D2>::type, T>(
00418             l.value() / r.value());
00419     }
00420 
00424     template <class D, class T>
00425     Quantity<typename Internal::sqrt_dims<D>::type, T>
00426     sqrt(Quantity<D, T> const& l) {
00427         return Quantity<typename Internal::sqrt_dims<D>::type, T>(
00428             std::sqrt(l.value()));
00429     }
00430 
00431     template<class D, class T, class stream>
00432     stream & operator<<(stream & s, Quantity<D, T> const & r) {
00433         s << r.value();
00434         return s;
00435     }

00444     namespace SI {
00445         typedef Quantity<dims::dimensionless> Dimensionless;
00446         typedef Quantity<dims::mass> Kilograms;
00447         typedef Quantity<dims::length> Meters;
00448         typedef Quantity<dims::force> Newtons;
00449         typedef Quantity<dims::angle> Radians;
00450         typedef Quantity<dims::time> Seconds;
00451 
00452         typedef Quantity<dims::speed> MetersPerSecond;
00453         typedef Quantity<dims::ang_speed> RadiansPerSecond;
00454         typedef Quantity<dims::accel> MetersPerSecondSquared;
00455         typedef Quantity<dims::torque> NewtonMeters;
00456         typedef Quantity<dims::stiffness> NewtonsPerMeter;
00457         typedef Quantity<dims::ang_stiffness> NewtonMetersPerRadian;
00458 
00459         typedef Quantity<dims::viscosity> NewtonSecondsPerMeter;
00460         typedef Quantity<dims::viscosity> KilogramsPerSecond;
00461         typedef Quantity<dims::ang_viscosity> NewtonMeterSecondsPerRadian;
00462 
00463         typedef Quantity<dims::moment_of_inertia> KilogramMetersSquared;
00464     } // end of SI namespace
